howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.step2: Place your phone on your forehead facing others
howToPlay.step3: Your friends give you clues about the card on the screen
howToPlay.step4: Tap the left side of the screen when you guess correctly
howToPlay.step5: Tap the right side to skip a card
howToPlay.step6: You have 2 minutes to guess as many cards as possible!
